title: Looking to buy signed T206 and other T and E cards
author: packs

posts.post_title: Looking to buy signed T206 and other T and E cards
posts.post_content:
Hello collectors,

I was very successful the last time I made this type of post and am hoping lightning will strike twice. 

I would like to buy any signed T206's, T205's and any other T or E cards that you may have for sale. I would prefer them to be authenticated, however I am always happy to buy from the respected members of this community who offer guarantees on their items as well.

Please do send me an e-mail if you have any signed cards for sale. I am looking for both common and star players.

My e-mail: [url]rare_baseballstuff@yahoo.com[/url]

Thank you so much.
